backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, habits, habit records, and access control with create/delete and profile save/query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication and deterministic user profile loading before rendering login, setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: Collapsible panel wrapper around HabitManager with toggle button and animated open/close state.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component capturing exceptions and rendering a custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: UI fallback shown on fatal errors with reload and retry options.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Interactive habit grid allowing completion toggles and amount editing with validation and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Form UI for creating, editing, and deleting habits with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app title, user info, theme toggle, CSV export, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with branding and a single login button.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Scrollable tab list allowing selection of a month by index.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form that saves the user's name via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Monthly progress visuals including pie, line, and volume charts computed from habit records.
frontend/src/components/ReportExportDial: Dialog for exporting habit data to CSV with date range and habit selection options.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard combining habit management, month selection, tracking grid, and progress charts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a reactive backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout helpers, and loads stored identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles, habits, and related records via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration placeholder for jsPDF.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses free-text duration strings into seconds and formats/validates duration values.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames for CSV/PDF based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Utilities for converting, labeling, and creating HabitUnit values for UI and backend use.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Builds and downloads CSV export reports using habit, record, and profile data.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC components, builds date ranges, and formats UTC dates.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes habit, daily, and volume statistics over a date range using habits and their records, producing overall percentages and detailed per-habit metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear or retrieve them with precedence rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and project-wide styling settings.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state, features, and versions, including authentication, RBAC, habits, and analytics capabilities.
